// program shows all invoices of the selected DEBTOR_HELLER
// if the user choose "including pending batches / schedules" we have
// to merge 3 tables together. To handle this, we use a SQL-union !

ExpSyntax.val: RTrim ({1,23})&' cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALH) as decimal (18,2)),cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal (18,2)),cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALI) as decimal (18,2))'&' from '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/INVO'&' '&Trim ({1,22})

RTrim ({1,24})&' INVO_CURRENCY,cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALI) as decimal (18,2)),cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALH) as decimal (18,2)),cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal (18,2))'&' from '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/INVO'&' '&Trim ({1,22})
RTrim ({1,24})&' and INVO_CURRENCY in (select distinct INVO_CURRENCY from '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/INVO'&' '&Trim ({1,22})&') group by INVO_CURRENCY'

RTrim ({1,27})&' cast (sum (INVO_AINITIALH) as decimal (18,2)),cast (sum (INVO_AINITIALC) as decimal (18,2)),cast (sum (INVO_AINITIALI) as decimal (18,2))'&' from '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/INVO'&' '&Trim ({1,26})

RTrim ({1,28})&' INVO_CURRENCY,cast (sum (INVO_AINITIALI) as decimal (18,2)),cast (sum (INVO_AINITIALH) as decimal (18,2)),cast (sum (INVO_AINITIALC) as decimal (18,2))'&' from '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/INVO'&' '&Trim ({1,26})
RTrim ({1,28})&' and INVO_CURRENCY in (select distinct INVO_CURRENCY from '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/INVO'&' '&Trim ({1,26})&') group by INVO_CURRENCY'

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT BPIV_INVO_NO, BPIV_AMOUNTCURRINV, INVO_CURRENCY FROM :1/INVO INNER JOIN :1/BPIV ON INVO_NO = BPIV_INVO_NO WHERE INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 AND INVO_SCHEDULEDATE <= ':3' AND (INVO_FINALPAYMENTDATE > ':3' OR INVO_FINALPAYMENTDATE IS NULL) AND BPIV_CASHREPORTDATE <= ':3' AND NOT (BPIV_BTCH_BATCHCODE =':4' AND BPIV_BTPC_LINENO = 2) FOR FETCH ONLY

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM :1/INVO WHERE INVO_DEBC_NO=:2 and INVO_SCHEDULEDATE <= ':3' and (INVO_FINALPAYMENTDATE > ':3' or INVO_FINALPAYMENTDATE IS NULL) FOR FETCH ONLY

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT count (distinct (a.CLNT102_CLNTNO)) FROM :1/CLNT a where :2 for fetch only with UR optimize for 100 rows

SELECT a.CLNT101_ADMNO, a.CLNT102_CLNTNO FROM :1/CLNT a, :1/TCAT b where :2 group by a.CLNT101_ADMNO, a.CLNT102_CLNTNO order by a.CLNT101_ADMNO, a.CLNT102_CLNTNO for fetch only with UR optimize for 100 rows

Text.valUnicode: Search with client name and city

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT a.CLNT101_ADMNO, a.CLNT102_CLNTNO, a.CLNT110_NAME1 , a.CLNT113_CITY, a.CLNT114_COUNTRY, a.CLNT205_EMP_CONTACT, a.CLNT803_CONTRACTSTARTDATE, a.CLNT803_CONTRACTTERMDATE, a.CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT FROM :1/CLNT a, :1/TCAT b where :2 group by a.CLNT101_ADMNO, a.CLNT102_CLNTNO, a.CLNT110_NAME1, a.CLNT113_CITY, a.CLNT114_COUNTRY, a.CLNT205_EMP_CONTACT, a.CLNT803_CONTRACTSTARTDATE, a.CLNT803_CONTRACTTERMDATE, a.CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT order by a.CLNT101_ADMNO, a.CLNT102_CLNTNO for fetch only with UR optimize for 100 rows

SELECT a.CLNT101_ADMNO, a.CLNT102_CLNTNO, a.CLNT110_NAME1 , a.CLNT113_CITY, a.CLNT114_COUNTRY, a.CLNT205_EMP_CONTACT, a.CLNT803_CONTRACTSTARTDATE, a.CLNT803_CONTRACTTERMDATE, a.CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT FROM :1/CLNT a, :1/TCAT b where :2 group by a.CLNT101_ADMNO, a.CLNT102_CLNTNO, a.CLNT110_NAME1, a.CLNT113_CITY, a.CLNT114_COUNTRY, a.CLNT205_EMP_CONTACT, a.CLNT803_CONTRACTSTARTDATE, a.CLNT803_CONTRACTTERMDATE, a.CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT order by a.CLNT101_ADMNO, a.CLNT102_CLNTNO for fetch only with UR optimize for 100 rows
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(a.CLNT101_ADMNO *100000 + a.CLNT102_CLNTNO)) FROM :1/CLNT a, :1/TCAT b where :2 for fetch only with UR optimize for 100 rows

SELECT a.CLNT101_ADMNO, a.CLNT102_CLNTNO FROM :1/CLNT a, :1/TCAT b where :2 group by a.CLNT101_ADMNO, a.CLNT102_CLNTNO order by a.CLNT101_ADMNO, a.CLNT102_CLNTNO for fetch only with UR optimize for 100 rows
